name: Project Astrid
description:
Shroud announces Project Astrid: The new Open-World Survival Shooter game he’s been working on alongside Sacriel and Splash Damage to bring forth a new era of gaming.

Splash Damage has over 20 years’ experience working on some of the biggest IPs in the world; Halo, Gears of War, Doom & more.

Combined with my expertise in the FPS Industry - I believe we will create something truly special.
